simsim.core
Class PeriodicTask

java.lang.Object
  simsim.core.Task
      simsim.core.PeriodicTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Task>, Displayable
public class PeriodicTask
extends Task

This is the base class for creating asynchronous periodic tasks in the simulator. Typically this class will be used to create anonymous classes by overriding run() to place the code to be executed at given times, in the future. Periodic tasks repeat execution with a given period (frequency) until canceled. They can be re-scheduled (within run()) to execute again at a later time. Periodic tasks can be canceled to prevent them from executing any further. Periodic tasks are executed according to simulation time.

Author:
SÃ©rgio Duarte (smd@di.fct.unl.pt)

public PeriodicTask(double period)
Creates an anonymous task that is automatically scheduled to run with a given frequency/period.

Parameters:

PeriodicTask

public PeriodicTask(double due,
                    double period)
Creates an anonymous task that is automatically scheduled to run with a given frequency/period.

Parameters:
due - The number of seconds before this task executes for the first time.
period - The period of time between successive executions.

PeriodicTask

public PeriodicTask(AbstractNode owner,
                    double period)
Creates a "named" task that is automatically scheduled to run with a given frequency/period. When a node is disposed all of its "named" tasks are canceled as well.

Parameters:
owner - The node that issued this task
period - The period of this task.

PeriodicTask

public PeriodicTask(AbstractNode owner,
                    double due,
                    double period)
Creates a "named" task that is automatically scheduled to run with a given frequency/period. When a node is disposed all of its "named" tasks are canceled as well.

Parameters:
owner - The node that issued this task
due - The number of seconds before this task executes for the first time.
period - The period of this task.
Method Detail

reSchedule

public void reSchedule(double t)
Description copied from class: Task
Asks the task to be scheduled again to execute after the given delay. The period is maintained.

Overrides:
reSchedule in class Task
Parameters:
t - The new deadline for next execution of this task.
